name: Rolld
description:
Enter the world of Roll'd where rolling comes in at a new degree.

Try and best you record with each game but remember about the twist, for you do not control the hero...
...you control the track.

Keep it steady and roll through the extremely diverse worlds and heroes and keep on racking them points to unlock all levels, difficulties and characters.

Run through the varying settings all specifically stylised with references and inspirations ranging from the CGA era, through 8-16bit NES/SNES to the golden ages of the Amiga and more. But at the same time they are all up to date with modern lighting effects, dynamic weather and some other cool visual treats.

Leaderboards are ready to go so to best your fellow man you can always check who has been the top Roller and Achievements have been set to test your skills. But be wary though, Roll'd can and will be unforgiving and reaching that extra point with each game will prove to be a demanding yet exciting task.

Features:

-A unique twist on a classic genre
-3 selectable control schemes: touch, slide or tilt
-Addictive gameplay in 5 diverse graphical themes
-3 difficulty settings, 25 characters in total: 5 per theme
-Leaderboards and Achievements
-Varying and beautiful graphical settings and animations
-Engaging Original Soundtrack by Roland Redwood and Efe Tozan
-Varying weather, atmospheric effects and day cycle
-Rich post effects going hand in hand with the visuals and audio

See you rolling!
